overview:
Dave Keefer has more than 15 years experience in Silicon Valley developing products and infrastructure for companies such as Netscape, ePinions, Shopping.com, Symantec and Silver Spring Networks. Dave has managed complex projects and led the development of Ztail from the ground up.

When heâ€™s not busy with Ztail, Dave can be found bicycling through the Palo Alto hills with his wife, enjoying time at home with their two sons and watching “L O S T”.
